com.absio.crypto.key

Interface IPublicKeySource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicKeyMapper

    public interface IPublicKeySource
    This interfaces represents a source for IndexedECPublicKey. You can get keys by index or latest active.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndexedECPublicKey getIndex(UUID userId, KeyType type, int index)
      This gets the public key that match the user ID, type and inde.
      IndexedECPublicKey getLatestActive(UUID userId, KeyType type)
      This gets the latest active public key that match the user ID and type.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        IndexedECPublicKey getIndex(UUID userId,
                            KeyType type,
                            int index)
                     throws Exception
        This gets the public key that match the user ID, type and inde.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id of the key owner
        type - the KeyType of the key
        index - the index of the key
        Returns:
        the IndexedECPublicKey for the user of the specified KeyType and index
        Throws:
        Exception - left open ended to allow the implementer to be less restrictive

      • getLatestActive

        IndexedECPublicKey getLatestActive(UUID userId,
                                   KeyType type)
                            throws Exception
        This gets the latest active public key that match the user ID and type.

        NOTE: if there is not an active key null will be returned.

        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        type - the KeyType of public key
        Returns:
        the latest active public key for the user of the specified KeyType
        Throws:
        Exception - left open ended to allow the implementer to be less restrictive
